item.title: Add points when voted
item.dc:creator: @putaz putaz
item.description:
@putaz wrote:

[quote=“k0isk0, post:7, topic:398194”]This is probably the easiest thing ever.

I mean

In character files you have this.

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3090
character-posy = 3501
character-rights = 4
points = 0

And i want it when you vote it adds 5 points to the points there.

I hope this helps.[/quote]
Why do you answer your own topic?

Read full topic
